title: Harissa baked fish with bulgur wheat
description: Harissa adds a wonderful smoky spice to the delicate flavour of white fish in this dish while the bulgur topping adds a healthy crunch. With a GI of 41, this meal is high protein, low GIThis meal provides 453 kcal, 47g protein, 40g carbohydrate (of which 11g sugars), 10g fat (of which 1g saturates), 9g fibre and 0.6g salt per portion.
ingredients: 1 orange or yellow pepper, deseeded and cut into 2cm chunks
3 heaped tbsp roughly chopped fresh coriander
2 x 200g/7oz skinless white fish fillets, such as cod or haddock
2 tbsp fat-free natural yoghurt, to serve
